{"id":755163436,"lang":"java","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1658641854,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"13 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/755163436/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"61.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    int check(int[][] grid, int i, int j){\n        int temp = 0;\n        if(i-1>=0)  temp += grid[i-1][j]==0 ? 1 : 0;\n        else    temp+=1;\n        if(i+1<grid.length) temp += grid[i+1][j]==0 ? 1 : 0;\n        else    temp+=1;\n        if(j-1>=0)  temp += grid[i][j-1]==0 ? 1 : 0;\n        else    temp+=1;\n        if(j+1<grid[0].length)  temp += grid[i][j+1]==0 ? 1 : 0;\n        else    temp+=1;\n        return temp;\n    }\n    public int islandPerimeter(int[][] grid) {\n        int max=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<grid.length;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<grid[i].length;j++){\n                if(grid[i][j]==1){\n                    max += check(grid,i,j);\n                    //System.out.println(check(grid,i,j));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
